docs.snippet: Uruguay is considering growing marijuana on plot of land controlled by the military to avoid illegal trafficking of the crop, which it legalized in December, the defense minister said on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay is considering growing marijuana on plot of land controlled by the military to avoid illegal trafficking of the crop, which it legalized in December, the defense minister said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Uruguay Says May Grow Marijuana on Military Land
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Says May Grow Marijuana on Military Land

docs.snippet: Gonzalo Mosca was a radical on the run. Hunted by Uruguay's dictators, he fled to Argentina, where he narrowly escaped a military raid on his hideout. "I thought that they would kill me at any moment," Mosca says.
docs.lead_paragraph: Gonzalo Mosca was a radical on the run. Hunted by Uruguay's dictators, he fled to Argentina, where he narrowly escaped a military raid on his hideout. "I thought that they would kill me at any moment," Mosca says.

headline.main: Survivors: Pope Francis Saved Many in Dirty Wars
headline.print_headline: Survivors: Pope Francis Saved Many in Dirty Wars

docs.snippet: The global fight against narcotics has suffered serious setbacks, including record opium cultivation in Afghanistan and a surge of trafficking-related violence in Central America, the U.N. anti-drugs chief said on Thursday.
docs.lead_paragraph: The global fight against narcotics has suffered serious setbacks, including record opium cultivation in Afghanistan and a surge of trafficking-related violence in Central America, the U.N. anti-drugs chief said on Thursday.

headline.main: U.N. Sees Serious Setbacks in Anti-Drugs Fight
headline.print_headline: U.N. Sees Serious Setbacks in Anti-Drugs Fight

docs.snippet: Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 is the latest example of a very rare event in aviation: a plane that vanishes.
docs.lead_paragraph: Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 is the latest example of a very rare event in aviation: a plane that vanishes.

headline.main: Mystery of Missing Jet Recalls Past Disappearances
headline.print_headline: Mystery of Missing Jet Recalls Past Disappearances

docs.snippet: Costa Rica defender Bryan Oviedo could still feature at the World Cup despite suffering a broken leg six weeks ago, Everton manager Roberto Martinez said.
docs.lead_paragraph: Costa Rica defender Bryan Oviedo could still feature at the World Cup despite suffering a broken leg six weeks ago, Everton manager Roberto Martinez said.

headline.main: Costa Rican Oviedo Could Still Make World Cup-Martinez
headline.print_headline: Costa Rican Oviedo Could Still Make World Cup-Martinez

docs.snippet: The United Nations anti-drugs chief said on Friday he did not see - for now at least - Uruguay setting a trend for countries to legalise the cultivation, sale and smoking of marijuana.
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations anti-drugs chief said on Friday he did not see - for now at least - Uruguay setting a trend for countries to legalise the cultivation, sale and smoking of marijuana.

headline.main: Uruguay Not Seen Setting Drug Liberalisation Trend: U.N. Official
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Not Seen Setting Drug Liberalisation Trend: U.N. Official

docs.snippet: Trade agreements like the Trans-Pacific Partnership would make our problems worse.
docs.abstract: Trade agreements like the Trans-Pacific Partnership would make our problems worse.

headline.main: On the Wrong Side of Globalization
headline.print_headline: On the Wrong Side of Globalization

docs.snippet: Zlatan Ibrahimovic took his season tally to a club record 40 goals as the Sweden forward's double inspired runaway leaders Paris St Germain to a 2-0 home win against St Etienne in Ligue 1 on Sunday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Zlatan Ibrahimovic took his season tally to a club record 40 goals as the Sweden forward's double inspired runaway leaders Paris St Germain to a 2-0 home win against St Etienne in Ligue 1 on Sunday.

headline.main: Prolific Ibrahimovic Sets PSG Goals Record
headline.print_headline: Prolific Ibrahimovic Sets PSG Goals Record

docs.snippet: Mr. Porter, a self-taught adventurer and climate scientist, was most famous for the climbing routes he devised up El Capitan in Yosemite National Park in the early 1970s.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Porter, a self-taught adventurer and climate scientist, was most famous for the climbing routes he devised up El Capitan in Yosemite National Park in the early 1970s.
docs.abstract: Charlie Porter, self-taught mountaineer and climate scientist who became most famous for climbing routes he devised up El Capitan in Yosemite National Park, dies at age 63.

headline.main: Charlie Porter, an Adventurer Scaling Rock and Sailing Seas, Is Dead at 63
headline.print_headline: Charlie Porter, 63, a Solitary Adventurer Who Reshaped the Ascent of a Monolith

byline.contributor: Pascale Bonnefoy contributed reporting from Santiago, Chile.

docs.snippet: The most wanted suspected drug lord in the Balkans, charged with smuggling 5.7 tons of cocaine from South America to Europe, was arrested Tuesday after surrendering to Serbian authorities, government officials said.
docs.lead_paragraph: The most wanted suspected drug lord in the Balkans, charged with smuggling 5.7 tons of cocaine from South America to Europe, was arrested Tuesday after surrendering to Serbian authorities, government officials said.
